00020 #include "minion.h"

00022 namespace BuildCon
00023 {  
00024 
00025 vector<AnyVarRef>
00026 get_AnyVarRef_from_Var(StateObj* stateObj, const vector<Var>& vec)
00027 {
00028   vector<AnyVarRef> ret_vec;
00029   ret_vec.reserve(vec.size());
00030   
00031   for(int i = 0; i < vec.size(); ++i)
00032     ret_vec.push_back(get_AnyVarRef_from_Var(stateObj, vec[i]));
00033   
00034   return ret_vec;
00035 }
00036 
00038 AnyVarRef
00039 get_AnyVarRef_from_Var(StateObj* stateObj, Var v)
00040 {
00041   switch(v.type())
00042         {
00043           case VAR_BOOL:
00044             return AnyVarRef(getVars(stateObj).getBooleanContainer().get_var_num(v.pos()));
00045           case VAR_NOTBOOL:
00046           return AnyVarRef(VarNotRef(getVars(stateObj).getBooleanContainer().get_var_num(v.pos())));
00047           case VAR_BOUND:
00048             return AnyVarRef(getVars(stateObj).getBoundVarContainer().get_var_num(v.pos()));
00049           case VAR_SPARSEBOUND:
00050             return AnyVarRef(getVars(stateObj).getSparseBoundVarContainer().get_var_num(v.pos()));
00051           case VAR_DISCRETE:
00052             return AnyVarRef(getVars(stateObj).getBigRangeVarContainer().get_var_num(v.pos()));
00053           case VAR_SPARSEDISCRETE:  
00054             INPUT_ERROR("Sparse Discrete not supported at present");
00055           case VAR_CONSTANT:
00056             return AnyVarRef(ConstantVar(stateObj, v.pos()));
00057           default:
00058             INPUT_ERROR("Unknown variable type " << v.type() << ".");
00059         }
00060 }
00061 
00064   pair<vector<AnyVarRef>, vector<int> > build_val_and_var_order(StateObj* stateObj, SearchOrder instance)
00065   {
00066       vector<int> final_val_order;
00067       vector<AnyVarRef> final_var_order;
00068       
00069       
00070       if(instance.var_order.size() < instance.val_order.size())
00071       INPUT_ERROR("Variable order cannot be shorter than value order.");
00072     
00073       if(instance.var_order.size() > instance.val_order.size())
00074       {
00075         getOptions(stateObj).print("# Var order size = " + to_string(instance.var_order.size()));  
00076         getOptions(stateObj).print( ", Val order size = " + to_string(instance.val_order.size()));
00077         getOptions(stateObj).printLine( ", so padding val order.");
00078       
00079         instance.val_order.insert(instance.val_order.end(), 
00080           instance.var_order.size() - instance.val_order.size(), instance.val_order.back());
00081       }
00082       
00083       CHECK(instance.val_order.size() == instance.var_order.size(), "Variable and Value orderings must be the same size!");
00084         
00085     
00086       for(unsigned int i = 0 ;i < instance.var_order.size(); ++i)
00087       {
00088         final_val_order.push_back(instance.val_order[i]);
00089         final_var_order.push_back(get_AnyVarRef_from_Var(stateObj, instance.var_order[i]));
00090       }
00091       return make_pair(final_var_order, final_val_order);
00092   } 
00093 
00095   void build_variables(StateObj* stateObj, const ProbSpec::VarContainer& vars)
00096   {
00097     getVars(stateObj).getBooleanContainer().setVarCount(vars.BOOLs);
00098     getVars(stateObj).getBoundVarContainer().addVariables(vars.bound);
00099     getVars(stateObj).getSparseBoundVarContainer().addVariables(vars.sparse_bound);
00100     getVars(stateObj).getBigRangeVarContainer().addVariables(vars.discrete);
00101     
00102     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < vars.sparse_discrete.size(); ++i)
00103     { INPUT_ERROR("Sparse discrete disabled at present due to bugs. Sorry."); }
00104   }
00105     
00106 }
